jurisdiction.title: National Coalition for Core Arts Standards

7ACA793C4B0B42B8B5581B68C970168F.description: Demonstrate understanding of relationship between music and the other arts, disciplines, varied contexts, and daily life.

9E5622E0CE1C4FF8AC1A54106E714272.description: Demonstrate understanding of relationship between music and the other arts, disciplines, varied contexts, and daily life.

02EF523C6B144C6EAFF20AF7D09E4502.description: Demonstrate understanding of relationship between music and the other arts, disciplines, varied contexts, and daily life.

6271305DAC844FAF8AA9800FB6093BF6.description: Connect #11: Anchor Standard #11 - Relate artistic ideas and works with societal, cultural, and historical context to deepen understanding.

38279D2417A848359E03C90DBC85FCF3.description: Demonstrate how interests, knowledge, and skills relate to personal choices and intent when creating, performing and responding to music.

ECC73C3768D64A3398BC008B82910EF1.description: Demonstrate how interests, knowledge, and skills relate to personal choices and intent when creating, performing and responding to music.

A00D4A182267413B933EC8FE347A2E57.description: Demonstrate how interests, knowledge, and skills relate to personal choices and intent when creating, performing and responding to music.

4882E262D85D46C095EE8EBE7F8B9433.description: Connect #10: Anchor Standard #10 - Synthesize and relate knowledge and personal experiences to make art.

FB787E154C0B49E59D7AF2C600637A5E.description: Apply appropriate personally-developed criteria to evaluate musical works or performances.

64285535120B472386B1DD492A1F8E8C.description: Select from teacher-provided criteria to evaluate musical works or performances.

8706F526685E4A1F9463F44DFCCD0876.description: Apply teacher-provided criteria to evaluate musical works or performances.

34F5AC45FBDC4E01B60095185DAE3B4C.description: Evaluate: Anchor Standard #9 - Apply criteria to evaluate artistic work.

A0E9B746889840838A22A272584502C1.description: Support personal interpretation of contrasting programs of music and explain how creators' or performers' apply the elements of music and expressive qualities, within genres, cultures, and historical periods to convey expressive intent.

5E18AE0B40AC4BB2AACD8BE3E161B94C.description: Describe a personal interpretation of contrasting works and explain how creators' and performers' application of the elements of music and expressive qualities, within genres, cultures, and historical periods, convey expressive intent.

3E686943E24F457B81E22A6DBEE34F96.description: Describe a personal interpretation of how creators' and performers' application of the elements of music and expressive qualities, within genres and cultural and historical context, convey expressive intent.

75F0A7A3354A40EABDBEEF0F0ED3168F.description: Interpret: Anchor Standard #8 - Interpret intent and meaning in an artistic work.

579AFC917B764BC4BC4909C10AE5526B.description: Identify and compare the context of programs of music from a variety of genres, cultures, and historical periods.

814915778D834A46BA88867FF3844410.description: Compare how the elements of music and expressive qualities relate to the structure within programs of music.

7F4BF531E1C34A69B946E56A5E65A08B.description: Identify and compare the context of music from a variety of genres, cultures, and historical periods.

8E2AC6471654429C9417DA908007C0AB.description: Classify and explain how the elements of music and expressive qualities relate to the structure of contrasting pieces.

47C766FDBEAA4A6D9D14795E7071F77E.description: Identify the context of music from a variety of genres, cultures, and historical periods.

3000D9EBDD284690B18E8D4D09FDB87C.description: Describe how the elements of music and expressive qualities relate to the structure of the pieces.

A50486861E8749B9A6FD3824CA03B8C3.description: Analyze: Anchor Standard #7 - Perceive and analyze artistic work.

F512E8346F74486B930BBB3F01F45187.description: Select programs of music (such as a CD mix or live performances) and demonstrate the connections to an interest or experience for a specific purpose.

0FD307ABEFA14B8786F5DCC43417F113.description: Select or choose contrasting music to listen to and compare the connections to specific interested or experiences for a specific purpose.

DAAEE50AA421408D856207ACD50015C9.description: Select or choose music to listen to and explain the connections to specific interests or experiences for a specific purpose.

CD1C658562354DABBEC3B7DB77E95440.description: Select: Anchor Standard #7 - Perceive and Analyze Artistic Work

3EE16BF5775A4FE6815FD849921BAE43.description: Demonstrate performance decorum (such as stage presence, attire, and behavior) and audience etiquette appropriate for venue, purpose, context, and style.

3D9A024972044113BCA2024E997CB901.description: Perform the music with technical accuracy, stylistic expression, and culturally authentic practices in music to convey the creator's intent.

032C5E84B2BF45D9AD2F7A5D768B5047.description: Demonstrate performance decorum (such as stage presence, attire, and behavior) and audience etiquette appropriate for venue, purpose, and context.

05F8F7A560BB42A0BAEF95DB81B03455.description: Perform the music with technical accuracy and stylistic expression to convey the creator's intent.

5698F7500B4C4F5293FA32CE8D30D55C.description: Demonstrate performance decorum (such as stage presence, attire, and behavior) and audience etiquette appropriate for venue and purpose.

63A125020B7C4D298C45FC6E918C8FD3.description: Perform the music with technical accuracy to convey the creator's intent.

56C750C25620475A980DD46730C3A0FE.description: Present: Anchor Standard #6 - Convey meaning through the presentation of artistic work.

17DD6F55150641C6B7C4686EE920C165.description: Identify and apply personally-developed criteria (such as demonstrating correct interpretation of notation, technical skill of performer, originality, emotional impact, variety, and interest) to rehearse, refine, and determine when the music is ready to perform.

0E65670474EE4299BB08010568D3B068.description: Identify and apply collaboratively-developed criteria (such as demonstrating correct interpretation of notation, technical skill of performer, originality, emotional impact, and interest) to rehearse, refine, and determine when the music is ready to perform.

DF0D60CCE1294A8E98AF1C2089D98589.description: Identify and apply teacher-provided criteria (such as correct interpretation of notation, technical accuracy, originality, and interest) to rehearse, refine, and determine when a piece is ready to perform.

5A84B044AB9241B39FFDAAD371A130EE.description: Rehearse, Evaluate, and Refine: Anchor Standard #5 - Develop and refine artistic techniques and work for presentation.

9F5B2712C30F46F4AA376DB9AE9C3BC8.description: Perform contrasting pieces of music, demonstrating as well as explaining how the music's intent is conveyed by their interpretations of the elements of music and expressive qualities (such as dynamics, tempo, timbre, articulation/style, and phrasing).

BD1E3CA18C684A18960308E3D26F4B0C.description: Perform contrasting pieces of music demonstrating their interpretations of the elements of music and expressive qualities (such as dynamics, tempo, timbre, articulation/style, and phrasing) convey intent.

7B74D2807F8B4B87A42E93EDB6DBA6A3.description: Perform a selected piece of music demonstrating how their interpretations of the elements of music and the expressive qualities (such as dynamics, tempo, timbre, articulation/style, and phrasing) convey intent.

392D48BFAB5146D0B35C87B3CDBD2329.description: Interpret: Anchor Standard #4 - Select, analyze, and interpret artistic work for presentation.

B83BA6C3E76D4905B8177B25ECC39BAC.description: Identify how cultural and historical context inform performances and result in different musical effects.

171757CF7DB041A68651E4725C38DDAE.description: When analyzing selected music, sight-read in treble or bass clef simple rhythmic, melodic, and/or harmonic notation.

CC36DC1E078E42658BF97DF74BC5B533.description: Compare the structure of contrasting pieces of music selected for performance, explaining how the elements of music are used in each.

214CA06B279B4E91BFD7CDFAD53D87E7.description: Identify how cultural and historical context inform performances and result in different music interpretations.

1241D0E5219045049591FC83C37C0AD9.description: When analyzing selected music, read and identify by name or function standards symbols for rhythm, pitch, articulation, dynamics, tempo, and form.

5B2D69CD2D2C410F930BE0EA628C67CB.description: Explain and demonstrate the structure of contrasting pieces of music selected for performance and how elements of music are used.

9917C434245745D7987079C3BC2A3889.description: Identify how cultural and historical context inform performance.

769AC32B52C5440192BF2C19FE08C3F7.description: When analyzing selected music, read and identify by name or function standard symbols for rhythm, pitch, articulation, and dynamics.

50F6D5DD9FA744A39AE1429FDFB2E2B2.description: Explain how understanding the structure and the elements of music are used in music selected for performance.

71AA258C310C46FA9BA6F420430E5CA5.description: Analyze: Anchor Standard #4 - Select, analyze, and interpret artistic work for presentation.

93C3EBE8AFE440FFA4D90DBAE7069516.description: Apply personally-developed criteria for selecting music of contrasting styles for a program with a specific purpose and/or context, and explain expressive qualities, technical challenges, and reasons for choices.

85516D4A85814ABC8C4890BFBEC1AE89.description: Apply collaboratively-developed criteria for selecting music of contrasting styles for a program with a specific purpose and/or context and, after discussion, identify expressive qualities, technical challenges, and reasons for choices.

BC0BD55E6E8C4994B8FC13118571549A.description: Apply teacher-provided criteria for selecting music to perform for a specific purpose and/or context, and explain why each was chosen.

BFD5340D7B584B468F970E27D9601F1D.description: Select: Anchor Standard #4- Select, analyze, and interpret artistic work for presentation.

43C316D5DF414B1E953BBD46DAE29E85.description: Performing: Select, Analyze, Interpret, Rehearse/Evaluate/Refine, and Present

7BD08721601A4074A0EE7357BE99288E.description: Present the final version of their documented composition, song, or arrangement, using craftsmanship and originality to demonstrate the application of compositional techniques for creating unity and variety, tension and release, and balance to convey expressive intent.

5B6FA71C35DC41F3B29EECC2A7AA194D.description: Present the final version of their personal documented composition, song, or arrangement using craftsmanship and originality to demonstrate unity and variety, and convey expressive intent.

0D67AE3243FA4A8B98E3A317200F94EF.description: Present the final version of their documented personal composition or arrangement, using craftsmanship and originality to demonstrate an effective beginning, middle, and ending, and convey expressive intent.

C21A969437994F7B853592E4BC5475F7.description: Present: Anchor Standard #3 - Refine and complete artistic work.

DCBE47B9726B404DB7D440D369E19A67.description: Describe the rationale for refining works by explaining the choices, based on evaluation criteria.

CF0C2BC292C144AB8811E0CFF97ABABE.description: Evaluate their own work by selecting and applying criteria including appropriate application of compositional techniques, style, form, and use of sound sources.

429B7D363594474FAE1BC55B2555FA5C.description: Describe the rationale for making revisions to the music based on evaluation criteria and feedback from others (teacher and peers).

04D7AE1046B34261B7A7CD091E98158B.description: Evaluate their own work, applying selected criteria such as appropriate application of elements of music including style, form, and use of sound sources.

F84B807FABBF45D1BEE0629B72B6A46F.description: Describe the rationale for making revisions to the music based on evaluation criteria and feedback from their teacher.

4B1EB19C57E2481E8D1146A5D1C5D286.description: Evaluate their own work, applying teacher-provided criteria such as application of selected elements of music, and use of sound sources.

97865D0CE2344057A18D3F260DE7FD23.description: Evaluate and Refine: Anchor Standard #3 - Refine and complete artistic work.

26A8324875B74D6995A62DA968416294.description: Use Standard and/or Iconic notation and/or audio/video recording to document personal rhythmic phrases melodic phrases, and harmonic sequences.

1AB84115274545A5B2711D0FF1BC9029.description: Select, organize, and document musical ideas for arrangements, songs, and compositions within expanded forms.

559CBF0AB68948D1BC6F6B583D8E3F29.description: Use standard and/or iconic notation and/or audio/video recording to document personal simple rhythmic phrases, melodic phrases, and harmonic sequences.

76FD34BDA8284F01B7B59DAB37D78523.description: Select, organize, develop, and document personal musical ideas for arrangements, songs, and compositions within AB, ABA, or theme and variation forms that demonstrate unity and variety and convey expressive intent.

66285331D13149788300ED95D87B10C6.description: Use standard and/or iconic notation and/or audio/video recording to document personal simple rhythmic phrases, melodic phrases, and two-chord harmonic musical ideas.

5D16831170B2428A8E02DA88125B94E5.description: Select, organize, construct, and document personal musical ideas for arrangements and compositions within AB or ABA form that demonstrate an effective beginning, middle, and ending and convey expressive intent.

A2179475D25C441B92A9C2F29289C6F7.description: Plan and Make: Anchor Standard #2 - Organize and develop artistic ideas and work.

6EFAEA5BA5024E389FB9247EBE70932B.description: Generate rhythmic, melodic, and harmonic phrases and harmonic accompaniments within expanded forms (including introductions, transitions, and codas) that convey expressive intent.

FA32978F60F54572B190F050CB0FA768.description: Generate rhythmic, melodic, and harmonic phrases, and variations over harmonic accompaniments within AB, ABA, or theme and variation forms that convey expressive intent.

FAFD972247A340B8B8FAD244CB938FC7.description: Generate simply rhythmic, melodic, and harmonic phrases within AB and ABA forms that convey expressive intent.

49282E8392BD4EE09C60279AC88C1512.description: Imagine: Anchor Standard #1 - Generate and conceptualize artistic ideas and work.

593EDD49AE72423AA5A8FE2B3CD6EA71.description: Creating: Imagine, Plan and Make, Evaluate and Refine, Present
